attributes.action: Ban the wearing of Jelly shoes
attributes.additional_details: Recently, and out of nowhere, there has been a rapid rise of the the jelly shoe. These vile and horrendous pieces of footwear are a crime towards fashion, and hurt the eyes of all who look upon them. Additionally, they make girls look like idiots and could easily lead to increased bullying. We must end this jelly shoe madness by banning them completely.
